createOrg.title: Create Your Organization
createOrg.description: Set up your organization to get started with React-boilerplate AI. You will be able to invite your team members in the next step.

name.title: Organization Name
name.description: This will be your organization's display name.
name.minLength: Organization name must be at least 3 characters

slug.title: URL Slug
slug.description: This will be used in your organization's URL.
slug.minLength: Slug must be at least 3 characters
slug.invalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

description.title: Organization Description
description.description: Optional: Describe what your organization does.

invite.title: Invite Colleagues
invite.description: Invite your team members to your organization.

emails.title: Email Addresses
emails.description: Enter email addresses separated by commas
emails.required: At least one email address is required
emails.invalid: Please enter valid comma-separated email addresses

form.submitError: Failed to send invitations. Please try again.

welcome.title: You're All Set! ðŸŽ‰
welcome.description: Congratulations! You've successfully set up your organization. Now, dive into React-boilerplate and start making the most of its powerful features. If you need any help, we're just a click away. Enjoy the journey!
